name: Driving Army Truck Level
description:
Driving Army Truck Level is more thrilling than the previous level. Drive carefully through the dark night, in foggy weather and in thundering rain.If you want to became a truck driver and this is imposibble for some reason for you you have to try this game. Incredible mission, realistic physics and optimizated truly detailed graphics for every device.
Game Features
-Steering wheel, buttons or tilting controls
-Wonderful sound
-Fanstanstic landscapes
-HD graphics
-Smooth and easy controls
